attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British public are no longer sure of why our troops are in Iraq or what they are trying to achieve anymore.  All we see every day in our newspapers or on TV is our troops being killed or grossly injured. (We never see any positive reports from ther region).  This is a terrible situation that appears to be getting worse and may never be resolved.   The withdrawal of some of our troops later in the year is too far away and therefore needs to be brought forward.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
